content: Heartbreaking story, thank you for sharing. I’m so sorry you went through this and the the broken system let you, your wife, and your sons down. My uncle was a heart transplant patient at the same hospital about 15 years ago. We know all about the waiting for someone to die dance. He received the heart of a 19 year old man who was killed in a car accident. I know he carries a great deal of guilt that a young man died, allowing him to live.
